SELECT sp.SHOW_VALUE AS orderTypeDesc, ssp.SHOW_VALUE AS orderStatusDesc, paymentp.SHOW_VALUE AS paymentModeDesc, osp.SHOW_VALUE AS orderSourceDesc, tb.* FROM tb_order tb LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary s on s.DICTIONARY_CODE='ORDER_TYPE' left join sys_dictionary_parameter sp on sp.SYS_DICTIONARY_ID=s.ID and tb.ORDER_TYPE = sp.REAL_VALUE
LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary ss on ss.DICTIONARY_CODE='ORDER_STATUS' left join sys_dictionary_parameter ssp on ssp.SYS_DICTIONARY_ID=ss.ID and tb.ORDER_STATUS = ssp.REAL_VALUE
LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary payment on payment.DICTIONARY_CODE='PAYMENT_MODE' left join sys_dictionary_parameter paymentp on paymentp.SYS_DICTIONARY_ID=payment.ID and tb.PAYMENT_MODE = paymentp.REAL_VALUE
LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary oss on oss.DICTIONARY_CODE='ORDER_SOURCE' left join sys_dictionary_parameter osp on osp.SYS_DICTIONARY_ID=oss.ID and tb.ORDER_SOURCE = osp.REAL_VALUE
AND tb.order_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or tb.consignee_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or tb.consignee_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND tb.id = #{id}

SELECT p.PURCHASE_CODE, p.ITEM_CODE, i.ITEM_NAME, i.SELL_UNIT AS itemUnit, p.TOTAL AS totalItemQty FROM tb_purchase p LEFT JOIN cd_item i ON i.ITEM_CODE = p.ITEM_CODE
AND p.ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.ITEM_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY p.CREATE_DATE DESC
